alert.note: Alert for Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact Starr County through 700 PM CDT... At 616 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near La Victoria, or near Garciasville, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rio Grande City, Roma, Sullivan City, Escobares, El Sauz, Viboras, Garciasville, La Rosita, La Grulla and La Victoria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
